sentences.en: She wore a sleeveless silk dress.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一身无袖真丝连衣裙。

sentences.en: She changed into loose slacks and a sleeveless silk blouse.
sentences.cn: 她换上宽松的长裤和一件无袖绸上衣。

sentences.en: It was a sleeveless, long white eyelet gown with a scoop neck.
sentences.cn: 这是一件无袖的镶着白色小圆孔和带有汤匙式领口的白色长礼服。
